A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1988-009

defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Blacksburg [Virginia] Odd Fellows Records, 1902-1969, Ms1988-009, Special Collections, University Libraries, Virginia Polytechnic Institute & State University.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Blacksburg Odd Fellows lodge was probably formed in December of 1904. It was a branch of the Grand United Order of Odd Fellows, a mutual relief society for people of color.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The Blacksburg, Virginia Odd Fellows Records consist of financial records, correspondence, minute books, brochures of several annual conferences, by-laws and odd issues of the Odd Fellows Journal for the men's lodge. There are also correspondence, minutes and financial records for the women's group - the Household of Ruth.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: The records are arranged in two series - Lodge and House of Ruth, and then arranged chronologically.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Grand United Order of Odd Fellows in America. Tadmore Light Lodge #6184 (Blacksburg, Va.)
